channel.title: Gettin my other comp to connect to server!
channel.description:
Hi there,
My friend has his own laptop and hes at my house and he cant connect to the server!!! Its gettin annoying, my friends say u have to PortForward nd I have already done that!! If someone coudld plz tell me or teamview me that would be great :)
Thx

item.title: Gettin my other comp to connect to server!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

lol if he’s using the same router you have to use 127.0.0.1 for both clients…

Read full topic
item.source: Gettin my other comp to connect to server!

item.title: Gettin my other comp to connect to server!
item.dc:creator: @saadmboy saadmboy
item.description:
@saadmboy wrote:

i Ban U:

yes. I typed in server = then my no-ip address in both clients.

I believe there are two places where you have to put your ip in client.java…search for 127.0.0.1 and replace it with your ip

Read full topic

item.title: Gettin my other comp to connect to server!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“i Ban U, post:3, topic:404738”]Not showing my ip address

[center][/center]Success: I can see your service on -my ip not showing- on port (43594)
[center][/center]Your ISP is not blocking port 43594[/quote]
That means you are portforwarded sucessfully do you have no-ip set up?

Read full topic
